name: Peppermint Cream Whip
description:
Indulge in this whipped body moisturizer made with the simplest of ingredients: shea butter, coconut oil, and an essential oil blend. This delightful treat has the consistency of your favorite whipped frosting and quickly melts onto your skin leaving it soft and supple with the invigorating and refreshing scent of sweet peppermint. Perfect for this holiday season! 

Choose between a 2 oz. matte black polypropylene jar (BPA-free plastic) or a 3 oz. deluxe glass mason jar packaged in our signature hot pink gift box.

Directions for use: Apply all over skin as needed. Will melt onto skin upon contact. Allow a few minutes for full product absorption before dressing. 

Ingredients: raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, essential oil blend*

*organic ingredient

**PLEASE NOTE** We highly recommend choosing Priority Shipping for this item at checkout (especially in the warmer months) to decrease the chance of product melting en route. The effectiveness of the product will not be compromised if the product melts, however the luxurious whipped texture will be. If melting occurs, place product in refrigerator for about 30 minutes or more until semi-solid again.

name: Fancy Feet
description:
Say goodbye to dry, cracked heels and unsightly feet! This balm combines the highly moisturizing and soothing benefits of unrefined shea and mango butters with sesame seed oil and the refreshing scent of peppermint and tea tree oils. It’s the perfect treat for tired, worn out feet. 

Size: 2oz

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to melt upon contact with the skin. Apply to feet on a daily basis. For best results, use just before bed and place cotton socks on feet overnight. 

Ingredients: virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, sesamum indicum (sesame) seed oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil*, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil*

* organic ingredient

name: Bare Hands
description:
Bare Hands contains the same ingredients as Bare Body Balm, but in a convenient size for moisturizing your hands. Comes in a silver metal tin with screw top lid and is in the shape of a lotus flower. Great for stashing in your purse or for placing next to the sink. Healthcare workers - keep one in your lab coat pocket and use throughout the day to combat the effects of frequent hand washing! Refills available at a lower cost (moisturizing bar without tin). 

Net wt. 1oz

Directions for use: Remove bar from tin and rub in hands just like you would a bar of soap. Place back in tin and continue rubbing hands until evenly distributed. 

Ingredients: virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*

*organic ingredient

name: Deluxe gift set
description:
This gift set includes one lip balm of your choice (Bare, Peppermint Pout, or Kiss of Coconut), one deluxe 3oz mason jar whip of your choice (Coconut Dream, Bali Breeze, or Bare), one Bare Hands, a 2oz Fancy Feet foot balm, and a Fabulous Face balm all packaged in a beautiful gift basket. 

*Please include your choices for lip balm and whipped body butter in the "notes to seller" section at checkout.

name: "Head-to-toe" gift set
description:
Save with this gift set that includes one lip balm of your choice (Bare, Peppermint Pout, or Kiss of Coconut), a 2oz whipped body butter of your choice (Coconut Dream, Bali Breeze, or Bare), and a 2oz Fancy Feet foot balm. Comes packaged in a hot pink organza bag. Perfect for gift giving!

*Please include your choices for lip balm and whipped body butter in the "notes to seller" section at checkout.

name: Sugar Scrub
description:
***Citrus Spice now 40% off while supplies last! Look for new seasonal scents to be added soon!***

Scrub away dull skin with this all natural sugar scrub made with 100% organic cane sugar, jojoba, macademia, coconut, and sweet almond oils.  Finish it off with a coordinating whipped body butter and your skin will feel softer than ever! Choose from 3 scents: Citrus Spice, Bali Breeze, and Coconut.

Net wt: 8oz

Directions for use: Scoop scrub into hands and massage over skin while showering. 

*Use caution as oils will leave shower surfaces slick.

Ingredients: sucrose*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil*, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, macadamia ternifolia seed oil*, essential oil blend* (coconut scent contains coconut flavor oil* in place of essential oil blend)

name: Bare Body Bling
description:
Enjoy all the benefits of unrefined raw shea butter, raw mango butter, and virgin coconut oil, while adding a touch of “bling” to your skin. This powerful moisturizer contains a fine light gold mica powder - perfect for highlighting your shoulders or décollatage or wherever else you might want to add a little sparkle.

Size: 1oz

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to soften and melt upon contact with the skin. Apply to areas of skin you wish to highlight.

Ingredients: virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*, mica, titanium dioxide 

*organic ingredient

*Please note: The shimmer effect from this product is subtle - you will not look like you were attacked with fairy dust! The image on this page showing the "sparkle effect" was enhanced for photographic purposes only.

name: Bare Body Whip
description:
Indulge in this whipped body moisturizer made with just 2 simple ingredients: shea butter and coconut oil. This delightful treat has the consistency of your favorite whipped frosting and quickly melts onto your skin leaving it soft and supple with no added fragrance.

Choose between a 2 oz. matte black polypropylene jar (BPA-free plastic) or a 3 oz. deluxe glass mason jar packaged in our signature hot pink gift box.

Directions for use: Apply all over skin as needed. Will melt onto skin upon contact. Allow a few minutes for full product absorption before dressing.

Ingredients: raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*

*organic ingredient

**PLEASE NOTE** We highly recommend choosing Priority Shipping for this item at checkout (especially in the warmer months) to decrease the chance of product melting en route. The effectiveness of the product will not be compromised if the product melts, however the luxurious whipped texture will be. If melting occurs, place product in refrigerator for about 30 minutes or more until semi-solid again.

name: Citrus Spice Whip
description:
***3oz deluxe size now 40% off (while supplies last) to make way for new seasonal scents! (2oz size currently out of stock and will not be available until next fall)***

Indulge in this whipped body moisturizer made with the simplest of ingredients. This delightful treat will leave skin soft and supple with the scent of sweet orange, ginger, and vanilla.

Choose between a 2 oz. matte black polypropylene jar (BPA-free plastic) or a 3 oz. deluxe glass mason jar packaged in our signature hot pink gift box.
(**11/26/13: 2oz size currently out of stock and will not be available until next season. New seasonal scents to be added soon!**)

Directions for use: Apply all over skin as needed. Will melt onto skin upon contact. Allow a few minutes for full product absorption before dressing.

CAUTION: This product contains sweet orange and ginger essential oils, both of which cause skin to become photosensitive. Avoid prolonged sun exposure for up to 24 hours after applying product to exposed skin. In other words, do not apply this moisturizer if you plan to spend a good portion of your day out in the sun. 

Ingredients: raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, essential oil blend*

*organic ingredient

**PLEASE NOTE** We highly recommend choosing Priority Shipping for this item at checkout (especially in the warmer months) to decrease the chance of product melting en route. The effectiveness of the product will not be compromised if the product melts, however the luxurious whipped texture will be. If melting occurs, place product in refrigerator for about 30 minutes or more until semi-solid again.

name: Bali Breeze Whip
description:
Indulge in this whipped body moisturizer made with the simplest of ingredients. This delightful treat will leave skin soft and supple with the warm, exotic scents of coconut and vanilla mixed with refreshing lemongrass - like vacation in a jar!

Choose between a 2 oz. matte black polypropylene jar (BPA-free plastic) or a 3 oz. deluxe glass mason jar packaged in our signature hot pink gift box. 

Directions for use: Apply all over skin as needed. Will melt onto skin upon contact. Allow a few minutes for full product absorption before dressing.

Ingredients: raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, coconut flavor oil*,  essential oils of vanilla planifolia* and cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass)*

*organic ingredient

**PLEASE NOTE** We highly recommend choosing Priority Shipping for this item at checkout (especially in the warmer months) to decrease the chance of product melting en route. The effectiveness of the product will not be compromised if the product melts, however the luxurious whipped texture will be. If melting occurs, place product in refrigerator for about 30 minutes or more until semi-solid again.

name: Coconut Dream Whip
description:
Indulge in this whipped body moisturizer made with just 3 simple ingredients: shea butter, coconut oil, and coconut flavor oil. This delightful treat has the consistency of your favorite whipped frosting and quickly melts onto your skin leaving it soft and supple with just a hint of coconut fragrance. 

Choose between a 2 oz. matte black polypropylene jar (BPA-free plastic) or a 3 oz. deluxe glass mason jar packaged in our signature hot pink gift box.

Directions for use: Apply all over skin as needed. Will melt onto skin upon contact. Allow a few minutes for full product absorption before dressing.

Ingredients: raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, coconut flavor oil*

*organic ingredient

**PLEASE NOTE** We highly recommend choosing Priority Shipping for this item at checkout (especially in the warmer months) to decrease the chance of product melting en route. The effectiveness of the product will not be compromised if the product melts, however the luxurious whipped texture will be. If melting occurs, place product in refrigerator for about 30 minutes or more until semi-solid again.

name: Bare Body Balm
description:
This balm is perfect for areas of dry skin or can be used all over! With the highly moisturizing benefits of unrefined raw shea butter, the soothing and softening effects of raw mango butter, and additional skin nourishing effects of virgin coconut oil, this balm packs a powerful punch and is sure to leave skin silky smooth all day long.

Size: 2oz (Also available in 1oz travel size - see options below)

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to melt upon contact with the skin. Apply to areas of dry skin as needed throughout the day. 

Ingredients: virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*

*organic ingredient

name: Lip Balm
description:
Treat your lips to this deeply moisturizing lip balm.

Formulated with unrefined shea and kokum butters along with coconut and jojoba oil, this balm glides on effortlessly leaving a subtle sheen while working hard to keep lips soft and smooth. 

Size: 0.15oz

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. Apply to lips throughout the day as needed. 

Available in bare (unflavored), coconut, or peppermint. Choose from the drop down menu below.

More flavors to come in the future!

Ingredients: pure cera alba (beeswax)*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw garcinia indica seed (kokum) butter*, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil* (organic flavor or essential oil extracts added to flavored versions)

*organic ingredient

name: Fabulous Face
description:
NEW FORMULA!!

Seriously? A balm for everyday face use?? Yes, that's right! You won't believe how velvety soft your skin will feel after applying this treat to your face. Contains high amounts of kokum butter and macadamia nut oil to provide deep moisture for all skin types without clogging pores or leaving behind a greasy feeling. New formulation includes babassu oil in place of coconut as well as tapioca starch. Babassu oil provides the same great skin benefits as coconut oil, but without the greasiness of coconut oil. Combined with the addition of tapioca starch and replacing some of the beeswax with jojoba esters, this balm provides loads of skin soothing moisture without a heavy feel. 

Great for use after exposure to the sun or cold weather. Also works great to soften and soothe blemish marks! 

Size: 1oz

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to melt upon contact with the skin. Use in place of your moisturizer day or night or to spot treat dry areas. A little goes a long way!

Ingredients: macadamia yernifolia seed oil*, raw garcinia indica seed (kokum) butter*, orbignya oleifera (babassu) seed oil*, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, jojoba esters, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*, manihot esculenta (tapioca) root starch*
*organic ingredient

*organic ingredient

name: Beautiful Baby
description:
Your sweet baby deserves nothing but the best! This balm contains sweet almond oil, which most closely matches the natural sebum produced by a baby’s skin. Combined with the highly moisturizing and soothing benefits of unrefined shea butter and virgin coconut oil, this balm will leave your baby’s skin oh so soft and will help keep skin irritations at bay.

- Easy one-handed application
- Cloth diaper friendly
- Stash a new travel size one in the diaper bag

Size: 2oz (Also available in 1oz travel size - see options below)

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to melt upon contact with the skin. Apply to all areas of baby's skin as needed. 

Ingredients: raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil*, virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*

* organic ingredient

name: Beautiful Belly
description:
This balm is formulated with cocoa butter which has long been sought after by pregnant women to help keep the skin around their growing bellies soft and pliable. With the additional moisturizing benefits of unrefined raw shea butter, the nourishing effects of virgin coconut oil, and the high vitamin E content in jojoba oil this balm is sure to leave you and your growing belly happy. 

Size: 2oz

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to melt upon contact with the skin. Apply to belly on a daily basis for best results. 

Ingredients: virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, raw theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*

*organic ingredient

name: Après Sun
description:
Formulated with aloe, macadamia, sweet almond, and coconut oils, this balm is perfect for soothing skin after exposure to the sun. Shea and mango butter join the mix to help restore lost moisture, leaving skin smooth, hydrated, and glowing. 

Size: 2oz (Also available in 1oz travel size - see options below)

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. The solid lotion will begin to melt upon contact with the skin. Apply to skin as needed throughout the day.

Ingredients: virgin cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, pure cera alba (beeswax)*, raw unrefined butyrospermum parkii (shea butter) fruit*, raw mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*, glycine soja (soybean) oil (and) aloe barbadensis leaf extract*, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil*, macadamia yernifolia seed oil

*organic ingredient

name: Bugs-B-Gone
description:
The name says it all for this one! Keep those pesky critters away (flies and mosquitos that is) with this all natural bug repellent formulated with bug repelling citronella, cedarwood, rosemary, and lemongrass essential oils. NO DEET!

Size: 1oz

Directions for use: Twist bottom of tube to expose product. Apply to areas of exposed skin you wish to protect.

Caution: Avoid contact with eyes as may cause irritation. Keep away from children (it's OK to use it on children, just make sure to supervise application).

First aid: May cause skin irritation in rare cases. If irritation occurs, wash skin with soap and water. Seek medical attention if irritation persists.

Active ingredients:  20% sesamum indicum (sesame) seed oil*, 10% ricinus communis (castor) oil* and essential oils of 5% cymbopogon nardus (citronella)*, 2% cedrus atlantica (cedarwood)*, 2% rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary)*, and 2% cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass)*

Inactive ingredients (59%): helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, cera alba (beeswax)* 

*organic ingredient

BareNaked Balms represents that this product qualifies for exemption from registration by the EPA under FIFRA.
